name: Legendary Lord of Dragons (BOSS)
text:
Once per turn, During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your Extra Zone. If this card would leave the field in any way, put it in the Extra Zone instead. Can only be Summoned once per turn. 
This card's name becomes "Lord of D." while on the face-up on the field. 
When this card is Special Summoned; You can discard 1 card; add 1 Spell/Trap card that mentions "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" or Dragon monster(s) from your Deck or GY to your hand. 
While this card is face-up on the field, Dragon monsters you control cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. 
Once per turn: You can pay 1000 LP; You can Normal Summon 1 Dragon monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. This effect can be used while this card is face-up on the field or while this card is in the Extra Zone. 

Concept by MauGamesLOL
